summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly higher on Friday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 13
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly higher on Friday, with 13 gaining and the other 5 declining.
Bitcoin rose 5.2% to $19,827 by market close.
